text: Avy Kaufman is an American casting director for film and television. ==Career== Since 1987, she has worked in casting more than 150 film and television productions.Database (undated). "Avy KaufmanFilm by Type". Internet Movie Database. Retrieved February 11, 2012. Based in New York City, New York, Kaufman has worked with directors including Steven Spielberg, Ang Lee and Wes Craven.Staff (May 24, 2009). "Top 25 Power Casting Directors in Film and TV". Backstage. Retrieved February 11, 2011. Her casting credits include the psychological thriller film The Sixth Sense (1999), the romantic drama film Brokeback Mountain (2005) and the crime drama film Public Enemies (2009). ===Accolades=== Kaufman received the 2005 Hollywood Casting Director of the Year award given by the Hollywood Film Festival.Press release (August 6, 2005). "Hollywood Fest Announces Craft Kudos HonoreesReccipients To Be Feted at Hollywood Awards Gala" . Retrieved February 11, 2012. She received a 2008 Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Casting for a Drama Series for her work on the drama television series Damages.Database (undated). "Award for Avy Kaufman". Internet Movie Database. Retrieved February 11, 2012. She had earlier been nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award for Outstanding Casting for a Miniseries, Movie, or a Special for her work on the romance drama television miniseries Empire Falls (2005). Kaufman has been nominated for eighteen Artios Awards, and has won three. ===Filmography=== {| class="wikitable sortable" !Date ! Title !
